statements: SELECT payment_id, payment_date, customer_id, amount FROM payment_data WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM payment_data WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT amount, payment_date, customer_id, payment_id FROM payment_data WHERE amount >= 1000;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, payment_date, amount FROM payment_data ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date, customer_id FROM payment_data ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, customer_id, amount FROM payment_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM payment_data WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payment_data ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_payment FROM payment_data WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM payment_data WHERE amount > 1000 AND payment_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date, payment_id FROM payment_data;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_data WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM financial_report;
SELECT total_profit, total_revenue, report_date, report_id FROM financial_report ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT payment_amount FROM payment_data WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_data WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT total_revenue, total_profit, report_date FROM financial_report WHERE total_profit < 5000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_data INNER JOIN financial_report ON payment_data.payment_id = financial_report.report_id WHERE payment_amount > 2000 AND total_revenue > 10000 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment_amount, MIN(payment_amount) AS min_payment_amount, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment_amount FROM payment_data;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM financial_report WHERE total_profit > total_revenue GROUP BY report_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT order_id, order_date, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_id FROM payments JOIN orders ON payments.payment_id = orders.payment_id;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 1
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE payment_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM orders INNER JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT sale_id, payment_id, product_id, sale_quantity FROM sales ORDER BY sale_quantity ASC, sale_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_price DESC;

SELECT sales.sale_id, payments.payment_amount, products.product_name FROM sales JOIN payments ON sales.payment_id = payments.payment_id JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id WHERE sales.sale_quantity > 5 ORDER BY sales.sale_quantity DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, payments.payment_date, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id JOIN sales ON payments.payment_id = sales.payment_id JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id WHERE customers.customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, amount, customer_id FROM payments WHERE payment_date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenues JOIN orders ON revenues.order_id = orders.order_id GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.product_name, orders.quantity, products.unit_price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
